name: The Last Pie
description:
This is my first attempt at making something in unity by myself. The object is it move through axe trap using the digits of Pi as a guide. I probably spent less then 20 hours on it and learned a bunch of new things about making a game in unity. I used all free assets from the store which are listed in the menu screen. Everything in the game, from the menu to the victory screen is done in Bolt. 

If the start menu doesn't work it's because I still need to learn more about making a ui. You might need to adjust your screen resolution to be able to hit the play button.

I must prepare for Game of Thrones so this is all I have time for, I hope you enjoy! Good luck

(If my build doesn't work it's because I've never made a build before. Please let me know and i'll try to make a new one
